"wasdenklich! warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen ohne unsere zustimmung? #datenschutz #privatsph√§re #nichtmehrzutage"

translation: "unbelievable! why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data without our consent? #dataprotection #privacy #nomoreexcuses"

this post is written in a critical tone, expressing disbelief and frustration towards companies that fail to protect personal information and violate data privacy. the hashtags used are popular ones related to data protection and privacy, aiming to reach a wider audience and spark discussions around the topic.
